contributions.message: For this 'Dragon's Crystal Ball' episode on Instagram, prioritize a highly visual and comedic approach. The Family Guy style comedy with the fortune teller dragon is key to hooking viewers initially, leveraging the animated title card to set the tone and signal premium production quality. Optimize for early retention by making the core concepts of Taylor series accessible through engaging visual metaphors like the crystal ball for predictions and shrinking errors.
